tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NoiseMeasurements (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
area_id INT,
measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
noise_level DECIMAL NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES UrbanAreas (id));

CREATE TABLE MitigationStrategies (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
area_id INT,
strategy_name TEXT NOT NULL,
strategy_description TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES UrbanAreas (id));

CREATE TABLE noise_pollution_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  noise_source_id INT,
  mitigation_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE noise_reports ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   report_date DATE, 
   area_id INT, 
   noise_level DECIMAL, 
   strategy_id INT, 
   source_id INT, 
   device_id INT 
 );
